channel.title: Ruix Release - The latest 459 - Ruix Release
channel.description:
Hola.
I have worked on this project alone for a little while, about 2-3 weeks. Haven't done much except fix some glitches like trading, combat, some shops, dialogues, etc. But, I guess this will show much more inferences and help alot of people with their 459 developments. So, here we go, right?
[u][b][size=12pt]Features[/size][/b][/u] -All skillcapes have the correct emotes. -Duel arena ranging glitch fixed, cannot range if the ranging block is selected. -Anchor emotes fixed. -Trading glitch where you could dupe. -Trading glitch that prevented you to decline the trade. -Combat glitch that would reset your HP if you hit the opponent too high. -New shops located everywhere. -More NPCs loaded with correct HP levels, etc. -New minigame. -Castlewars base. -Warrior's guild base. -NPC contact spell from the Lunar book done.
And thats about all I have changed.
[u][b][size=12pt]Pictures[/size][/b][/u] Login page. [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Login.png[/img]
Barrage emote fixed, skillcape emotes. [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/BarrageNEmote.png[/img]
Some shops. [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Shops.png[/img]
Stats lookup. [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Wearing.png[/img]
[u][b][size=12pt]Credits[/size][/b][/u] Graham for the awesome Hyperion base. Project Annihilation development team (Brian, Ryan, Mikkel, Tom) Nexus_.
[size=12pt][u][b]Download Link[/b][/u][/size] http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GO7303AJ
[b]This is not for my own purposes; this is to show everyone how much of a great base Ruix is, it was hosted with 50+ people on at average. I got screwed over, so I just released it.
This base is the most advanced 459 out there as of now, and I cant really be able to keep it that way; i'm working on a 319 with Brian (Scully) atm. This source has alot of conventions and helping comments (//) that tell you what is what.[/b]
[u]No problem.[/u]

item.title: Ruix Release - The latest 459 - Ruix Release
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

[quote=“cbk666, post:28, topic:340537”][quote author=Olrek link=topic=436905.msg3211284#msg3211284 date=1274268624]

Dude. The client has the 459 map data already in it. If you dont know how to work any of this. Then dont download it. Im sure Nexus agrees. But good job Nexus i like this you just need to add a portal so admins dont have to spawn it.

No it is missing half of the mapdata like almost all other pja’s are so don’t tell me i don’t know
[/quote]

Well, Nexus gave me client with map data. You can just use skully’s client it has the map data. Nexus said it already has the map data in it.[/quote]
Yes. Just search up “annihilation” and use that client if your having trouble with this one; I tweaked this client a bit though, so this one is more up-to-date.

Read full topic
